articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with War Veteran Delegates
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with War Veteran Delegates
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, had a photo session with the war veteran delegates who took part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					Present there were Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Jang Jong Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Ri Yong Mu, O Kuk Ryol, Kim Won Hong, Choe Pu Il, Ri Pyong Sam and Ju Kyu Chang and veteran anti-Japanese fighters Ri Ul Sol, Hwang Sun Hui and Kim Chol Man.
					
					When Marshal Kim Jong Un appeared, the participants shouted "hurrah!" enthusiastically welcoming him. They paid greatest glory and gratitude to Kim Jong Un, who is glorifying generation after generation the immortal exploits the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung performed by winning the victory in the war and the feats the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il performed by leading the Songun revolution to victory.
					
					Kim Jong Un warmly acknowledged the enthusiastically cheering participants.
					
					He warmly congratulated the war veteran delegates upon their great contributions to winning the brilliant victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and had a photo session with them.
					
					He expressed expectation and conviction that the war veterans would be in good health and hand the spirit displayed in the 1950s over to the rising generation as a legacy and thus encourage them to giving a steady continuity to the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Overseas Koreans
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, Tuesday had a photo session with overseas Koreans who took part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					Present there were Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Jang Jong Nam, Yang Hyong Sop and Kim Yang Gon.
					
					Also present there were the delegation of overseas Korean war veterans headed by Kim Kang Hui, congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan headed by Hong In Hum, chairman of the Central Audit Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China headed by Chairperson Choe Un Bok, delegation of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia headed by Chairperson Jang Sun Jong, delegation of the International United Confederation of Koreans headed by First Chairman Kim Chil Song, delegation of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. headed by Chairman Yun Kil Sang, Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, Pak Sang Gwon, secretary general of the World Peace Federation, and other overseas Koreans.
					
					When Marshal Kim Jong Un appeared, all the participants broke into stormy "hurrah!" enthusiastically welcoming Kim Jong Un, who is making all his devotion and efforts for the prosperity of the country and its national reunification as well as the strengthening of the Juche-based movement of overseas Koreans.
					
					He waved to the cheering participants with a smile on his face.
					
					He warmly congratulated the participants on playing a big role in defending the undying feats the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by strengthening the overseas Koreans movement and in firmly defending and strengthening the organizations of compatriots and Koreans' community under difficult circumstances in alien lands.
					
					He had a picture taken with the overseas Koreans, expressing expectation and conviction that they would make tangible contributions to bringing earlier the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and the building of a thriving nation, keeping pace with the people in the homeland dynamically advancing to the final victory.

articles.title: Minister of People's Armed Forces Meets Delegation of Russian Korean War Veterans
articles.content:
Minister of People's Armed Forces Meets Delegation of Russian Korean War Veterans
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Jang Jong Nam, minister of the People's Armed Forces, Tuesday met and had a talk with the delegation of the Russian Korean war veterans led by Ya. V. Kanov, vice-chairman of the Korean War Veterans' Council of Russia.

articles.title: Performances Given by CPLA Literary and Art Delegation
articles.content:
Performances Given by CPLA Literary, Art Delegation
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The literary and art delegation of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (CPLA), which took part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War, gave performances at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Sunday and Tuesday. 
					Among the audience were Kim Kyok Sik, Kang Sok Ju, Mun Kyong Dok, Hong Son Ok, secretary of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, servicepersons of the KPA, creators, artistes, teachers and students in the armed forces organs and fields of social art and Pyongyangites.
					
					Also watching the performances were Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of the Chinese embassy, Chinese guests staying here and Chinese students studying here.
					
					The male solo impressively represented "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and "Song of General Kim Jong Il", the immortal revolutionary hymns, to touch heartstrings of the audience.
					
					Put on the stage were female solo, male solo, acrobatics and other colorful numbers reflecting the heroic struggle and optimistic picture of the army and people of China. 
					
					A male solo "Song of Chinese People's Volunteers"  vividly reflected feats of the soldiers of CPV who bravely fought in the Korean front against U.S. imperialism under the banner of resisting America and aiding Korea, safeguarding the home and defending the motherland.
					
					A male soloist earnestly sang "Sing, Fork to Mangyongdae" highly praising the undying revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung who devoted himself to prosperity of the country and happiness of the people, deeply touching the audience. 
					
					The performers made truthful artistic portrayal of the ideological and thematic contents of all works with rich voice, well-organized ensemble, graceful rhythm and good talents, winning warm applause from the audience.

articles.title: Friendship Joint Gathering of War Veterans of DPRK, China Held
articles.content:
Friendship Joint Gathering of War Veterans of DPRK, China Held
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- A friendship joint gathering of war veterans of the DPRK and China took place at the People's Theatre on Monday to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Kim Yong Il and others, war veterans taking part in the celebrations, service personnel of the Korean People's Army, youth and students in Pyongyang and members of the delegation of overseas Korean war veterans led by Kim Kang Hui, head of the lecturers group of veterans of the Chinese People's Volunteers(CPV), the delegation of war veterans of the CPV  headed by Yu Zhenwu, former commander of the Air Force of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, the delegation of war veterans and families of martyrs of the CPV headed by Yang Guoying, vice department director of the Ministry of Civil Affairs of China, the literary and art delegation of the Chinese People's Liberation Army headed by Li Xiubao, deputy head of the Publicity Department of the General Political Department of the CPLA, Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy, Chinese guests staying in the DPRK and Chinese students.
					
					Choe Yong Rim, honorary vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, said the July 27 victory was a victory won thanks to Generalissimo Kim Il Sung's original military idea, war methods, faith and will, grit and pluck, enthusiasm and benevolence, and a joint victory won by the Korean and Chinese peoples shoulder to shoulder in the same trench.
					
					The land of China is stained with red blood shed by Korean youth who brought about a victory together with the Chinese people, true to Kim Il Sung's intention during the anti-Japanese war and the war for liberating the Northeast area of China, he said, adding recorded in this land are feats of the martyrs of the CPV who participated in the Korean front, true to the appeal of Chairman Mao Zedong.
					
					Liu Hongcai said the CPV fought shoulder to shoulder with the army of the DPRK, holding the banner of resisting America and aiding Korea, safeguarding the home and defending the motherland and contributed to achieving the great historic victory through the rigorous struggle and defending peace and stability in Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					The friendship between the two countries sealed in blood is a common treasure, he said, stressed the need to inherit the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship down through generation, true to the intention of the martyrs.
					
					Amid the playing of male chorus "July 27 March" war veterans of the DPRK and the CPV recollected with deep emotion the day when they fought in the same trench, sharing warm feelings.

articles.title: Chinese Guests and Overseas Koreans Visit Mangyongdae and Various Other Places
articles.content:
Chinese Guests, Overseas Koreans Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Chinese guests and overseas Koreans visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					They included families of Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyrs, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, Korean anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters in China, Korean anti-Japanese revolutionary martyrs in China and Koreans related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in China, bereaved family of DPRK Hero An Tong Su and family of overseas Korean related to revolutionary activities of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					Visiting Kim Il Sung's old home in Mangyongdae, they went round historic relics with deep care, being briefed on the story about the glorious revolutionary history of Kim Il Sung and his patriotic and revolutionary family members in Mangyongdae.
					
					At the end of the visit the son of Wang Minggui, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, said:
					
					Mangyongdae is a significant place where President Kim Il Sung was born.
					
					The President waged the arduous struggle against the Japanese imperialists for Korea's liberation.
					
					His exploits are widely known as he won a brilliant victory in the Korean war with his outstanding strategy, tactics and commanding art.
					
					The Chinese people have highly respected the great President.
					
					They also visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and others.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests who took part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Tuesday to pay tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					They included the delegation of war veterans of the Chinese People's Volunteers (CPV) headed by Yu Zhenwu, former commander of the Air Force of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, delegation of war veterans and families of martyrs of the CPV headed by Yang Guoying, vice department director of the Ministry of Civil Affairs of China, and the literary and art delegation of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (CPLA) headed by Li Xiubao, deputy head of the Publicity Department of the General Political Department of the CPLA.
					
					They expressed profound homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before their statues in deep reverence for the peerlessly great men.
					
					In the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state, they paid tribute.
					
					They looked round the halls where the orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display and the halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches they used during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their lives.
					
					They made entries in the visitor's book.
					
					Yu Zhenwu wrote: Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il always live in our hearts.
					
					Li Xiubao wrote that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the great leaders of the Korean people and close friends of the Chinese people, are always alive.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan headed by Hong In Hum, chairman of the Central Audit Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.

articles.title: Delegation of War Veterans, Families of Martyrs of CPV Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of War Veterans, Families of Martyrs of CPV Leaves
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The delegation of war veterans and families of martyrs of the Chinese People's Volunteers (CPV) headed by Yang Guoying, vice department director of the Ministry of Civil Affairs of China, Tuesday left here for home after taking part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.content:
Vietnamese Police Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the General Police Bureau of Vietnam headed by To Van Thuong, director of the bureau of the Ministry of Public Security, left here for home on Tuesday after participating in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.

Ugandan Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The Ugandan high-level military delegation headed by Odongo Jeje, minister of State for the Ministry of Defense, left here for home on Tuesday after taking part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Special Advisor to Kyodo News Leaves

Special Advisor to Kyodo News Leaves
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Yoji Isikawa, special advisor to the Kyodo News, Tuesday flew back home after taking part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: AP Vice President Leaves
articles.content:
AP Vice President Leaves
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- John Daniszewski, vice president of the Associated Press of the U.S., flew back home on Tuesday after taking part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory of the great Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations, Delegates and Guests Leave
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations, Delegates and Guests Leave
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Foreign delegations, delegates and guests left here for home on Monday after taking part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					They are the Ugandan delegation led by Vice-President Edward Kiwanuka Sekandi, Zambian delegation led by Vice-President Guy Scott, Syrian delegation headed by Abdullah al-Ahmar, deputy general secretary of the Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party, delegation of the Lao party and government, Indonesian government delegation, Indian government delegation, representative of the president of the State of Palestine, delegation of the Communist Party of Cuba, delegation of the Communist Party in Sweden, delegation of the Czechoslovak Communist Party, delegation of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran, delegation of the Mongolian People's Party, delegation of the National Democratic Party of Mongolia, delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico, delegation of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, delegation of the Italian Parliament, delegation of deputies of the State Duma from A Just Russia, delegation of the United Left Movement of Dominica, delegate of the Liberal 
					
					Democratic Party of Russia, delegate of the Sandinist National Liberation Front of Nicaragua, member of the Political Executive Committee of the Central Committee of the Party of Communists of the Republic of Moldova, member of the Central Committee of the Ukrainian Communist Party who doubles as second secretary of the Crimean Republic Committee, Mongolian government military delegation, Iranian military delegation, Tanzanian military delegation, Vietnamese military delegation, Mozambican military delegation, delegation of the Ministry of Justice of Mongolia, delegation of the Belarus-DPRK National Friend Association Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, delegation of the Federation of Peace and Friendship Organizations of Mongolia, delegation of the Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association, delegation of the Indonesia-Korea Association for Friendship and Cultural Exchange, delegation of the Choson Exchange Association in Singapore, delegation of the Malaysia-DPRK Friendship Association, delegation of the New Zealand-DPRK Society, delegation of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, delegation of the Turkey-Korea Friendship Association, Shanghai law and investment delegation of China, director of a Chinese company and his companion, vice-chairman of the Ukraine-DPRK Association, vice-president of the Philippines Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification in the Korean Peninsula, delegation of the Institute for Strategic Studies of Mongolia, delegation of the Vietnam Women's Union, delegation of the China Institutes of Contemporary International Relations, Kanji Inoki, president of the Inoki Genom Joint Co., Ltd. of Japan, and his party, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and his party, secretary general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and the delegation of the Global Partnership for the Prevention of Armed Conflict.
					
					Earlier leaving here was the delegation of the Iranian Majlis Friendship Group.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Overseas Koreans
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un on Monday received a letter from members of delegations of overseas Koreans who took part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					The letter said that the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War was attributable to the Juche-oriented military idea, rare commanding art, matchless courage and admirable virtue of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung who was a legendary hero of the anti-Japanese armed struggle and invincible and iron-willed commander. 
					
					Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, peerlessly brilliant commander, carried on through centuries the history of victory in the war which shattered the myth of the U.S. imperialists' "mightiness" in the eyes of the world and brought about the beginning of decline for them, the letter said, and went on:
					
					The feats the great Generalissimos performed by winning the victory in the war are shining thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un, another peerlessly great man.
					
					The immortal exploits of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu will go down through generations to the history of the country.
					
					Kim Jong Un called overseas Koreans to come to the motherland to celebrate the V-day with its servicepersons and people and showed paternal affection to them lest they should feel even the slightest convenience, they noted.
					
					They vowed to uphold the Generalissimos as the eternal sun of the nation, remain loyal to the leadership of Kim Jong Un and live as patriotic Koreans making tangible contribution to the prosperity of the motherland.

articles.title: Korean Stamp Exhibition under Way in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Korean Stamp Exhibition under Way in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- A Korean stamp exhibition is going on at the Korean Stamps Museum here to mark the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953).
					In this regard, KCNA met Pak Il Hwa, a researcher of the museum.
					
					She said:
					
					Displayed at the exhibition are stamps of diverse themes featuring the undying feats President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk performed for strengthening of the revolutionary armed forces.
					
					56 kinds of stamps issued during the war have come under spotlight of visitors.
					
					Printed on July 10, Juche 39 (1950), "Liberation of Seoul City" is the first stamp published in the period. It depicts the DPRK Flag hanging on the roof of the "Capital Building" in the city.
					
					Among them are stamps picturing such winners of the title of DPRK Hero in the war as a pilot Kim Ki Ok, who downed B-29 and other U.S. warplanes, Kim Ki U, who shot down at least 10 U.S. warplanes as a member of an aircraft-hunting team, and Ri Su Dok, who fought bravely in the enemy-controlled area as a commander of a people's guerrilla unit.
					
					They also include stamps picturing Kim Ok Song, Pak Han Gyu and Ri Myon Sang, who composed "To a Decisive Battle", "Nobody Knows", "The Dear Home in My Native Village" and other wartime songs.
					
					What catches visitors' eyes is the stamp featuring the 4th World Festival of Youth and Students. 
					
					Stamps "For Final Victory" (Nov. 1951) and "DPRK-China Friendship" (Jul. 1952) depict the Chinese People's Volunteers, who fought in the Korean War on the side of the Korean People's Army under the banner of resisting America and aiding Korea, safeguarding the home and defending the motherland.
					
					On display are more than 1,100 kinds of stamps issued after the war to commemorate the Korean people's victory.
					
					The exhibition will run till July 31.

articles.title: Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Show Closes
articles.content:
Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Show Closes
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia show closed with due ceremony on Tuesday at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition, Pyongyang.
					The show opened on July 24 on the occasion the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					Visiting the show were leading officials of the party, state and army, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, civic organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, peoples of all social strata and school youth and children.
					
					Many overseas compatriots and foreign guests looked round the show, expressing deep admiration.
					
					They included the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and delegations of the overseas compatriots and diplomatic envoys of different countries, representatives of international bodies and members of the military attaches corps and the economic and commercial councilors corps here.
					
					Present at the ceremony were Yang Hyong Sop and Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, officials concerned, officials of the armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, service personnel and those who presented flowers to the show.
					
					Present there were the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan which took part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and members of the society for disseminating and supporting the famous flowers.
					
					Diplomat of excellent prize was awarded to 10 units including the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and diploma of special prize to the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.
					
					40 units were awarded diplomas of ace prize and top prize, cultivators of different units who grew the flowers scientifically and technically the diploma of prize for technical cultivation and members of the society for disseminating and supporting famous flowers the diploma of prize of merit.
					
					Kim Chang Do, chairman of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee, made a closing address.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize Closes
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize Closes
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize closed with due ceremony in Hamhung, South Hamgyong Province Tuesday. It was opened to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					At the contest the players of South Hamgyong Province placed first in total standing while those of North Phyongan Province second and those of South Hwanghae Province third.
					
					Kim Pyong Sik, vice-minister of Physical Culture and Sports, addressed the ceremony.

articles.title: U.S.-Japan Treaty Aimed at Aggression on Korea: News Analyst
articles.content:
U.S.-Japan Treaty Aimed at Aggression on Korea: News Analyst
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- It has been 108 years since the United States and Japan concluded "Katsura-Taft Treaty" (Jul. 29).
					The treaty was an outcome of the U.S.-Japan tie-up for invasion of Korea.
					
					In the 19th century, the U.S. chose Japan as an "ally" in its Asia-Pacific strategy, after suffering a series of defeats in its attempts to invade Korea.
					
					After the 1868 Meiji Restoration, Japan had sought to conquer Korea under the "theory of the conquest of Korea". And it found commonness with the U.S. in their interests.
					
					In July 1905, the U.S. secretary of the Army, Taft, and Japanese Prime Minister Katsura had secret talks in Japan to conclude an agreement confirming the security of each other's colony.
					
					In the agreement concluded in the form of exchange of secret memoranda the U.S. recognizes Japan's suzerainty on Korea, the suzerainty that forbids Korea from concluding any agreement with foreign countries without Japan's consent, in return for Tokyo's pledge not to intervene in the U.S. control of the Philippines.
					
					This criminal treaty paved a way for Japan to put Korea under its colony for 40 years.
					
					The Korean people will surely make the U.S. and Japan pay for their past wrongdoings.

articles.title: Newspapers Observe Anniversary of Promulgation of Law on Sex Equality
articles.content:
Newspapers Observe Anniversary of Promulgation of Law on Sex Equality
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's leading newspapers here Tuesday dedicate editorials to the 67th anniversary of the promulgation of the Law on Sex Equality.
					Rodong Sinmun says that the Korean women's movement victoriously advanced under the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. The paper went on:
					
					Kim Il Sung provided the precious experience of the Juche-oriented women's movement amid the flames of the anti-Japanese war, successfully solved the issue of the woman's emancipation on legal and institutional basis and wisely led the women to wage the dynamic struggle for the freedom and independence of the country and for the building of new society.
					
					Kim Jong Il put his great efforts and soul into the development of the women's movement out of his noble idea that the Korean women should be an example of the world women in their ideological and mental aspects and in the fighting mode, lifestyle and cultural level.
					
					He put the female service personnel forward as the staunch revolutionaries and brought up a lot of women to be the merited persons of the Songun era by providing field guidance. The Korean women could creditably fulfill their responsibility and role for the times and revolution under his care.
					
					Today the Juche-oriented women's movement is enjoying the best time of its development under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					Minju Joson noted that all the women should accelerate today's general advance for the country's prosperity under the leadership of Kim Jong Un and thus demonstrate their indomitable mettle to the world.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Authorities for Suppressing Pro-Reunification People
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Authorities for Suppressing Pro-Reunification People
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean authorities arrested and detained the acting chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) and a member of the Organizing Committee of the headquarters on absurd charges of the violation of the infamous "Security Law", saying that they conducted activities after acceding to the "enemy-benefiting organization".
					Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					This is an unpardonable action to disintegrate and obliterate the Pomminryon South Headquarters that stands in the van of the movement for the country's reunification, a vicious challenge to all the Koreans who aspire after the improvement of the inter-Korean relations, and the anti-reunification action to dampen the ever- mounting atmosphere for the national reconciliation, unity and independent reunification.
					
					The members of Pomminryon South Headquarters have done nothing to be incriminated.
					
					They have so far positively carried on the struggle to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and achieve the peace and reunification on the peninsula in line with the Koreans' ardent will for reunification, and to realize independence and democracy in south Korean society.
					
					The members of Pomminryon South Headquarters who were arrested and detained by the south Korean authorities are suffering from serious illness in jail owing to the crackdown by the anti-reunification forces.
					
					The south Korean fascists' suppression of the pro-reunification forces is related to the serious ruling crisis those maniacs have faced.
					
					They are seized with fear in the face of the people's struggle to judge the regime. Therefore, they are making desperate efforts to intensify the crackdown upon the pro-reunification forces and calm down the struggle against the regime to get rid of the ruling crisis.
					
					No fascist crackdown by the south Korean authorities can ever block the just and patriotic activities of the pro-reunification forces including Pomminryon which is waging unflinching struggle for independence, democracy and reunification.

articles.title: All-people Candlelight Rally Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
All-people Candlelight Rally Held in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- An all-people candlelight rally took place in Seoul, south Korea on Saturday under the sponsorship of the Emergency Situation Council to Denounce the Intelligence Service's Interference in Presidential Election for Political Operation which consists of 200 plus civic and social organizations. 
					More than 25,000 people including members of civic and social organizations, university students, citizens and overseas Koreans took part in the rally. 
					
					Speakers at the rally said the last "presidential election" was illegal as it was affected by corrupt practices of the Intelligence Service. 
					
					Nevertheless, the ruling quarters disturb in every way the investigation into the IS's interference in the election now under way by the protests and demand of people of different social standings, they said, and went on: 
					
					Nam Jae Jun, director of the IS, refused to appear in the special committee of the "National Assembly" for the investigation, an action of disregarding the people. 
					
					Media have not reported the news of the people's movement for making public the declaration on the situation denouncing the illegality of the IS as well as the news of the revelation of video footage of the place where the IS conducted illegal cyber terror during the "presidential election". 
					
					The responsibilities for them rest with the "Saenuri Party" and the present chief executive. 
					
					The speakers strongly called for probing the truth behind the IS's politically-motivated operation through the investigation and detain all those related to the case. They demanded the reform of the IS and responsible steps by the present chief executive.

articles.title: End to State of War Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
End to State of War Urged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People on July 27 posted an article calling for an end to the state of war on the Korean Peninsula.
					The state of war has lasted on the peninsula since the signing of the Armistice Agreement (AA) on July 27, 1953, a thing unprecedented in human history, the article said.
					
					The U.S. forces have stayed in downtown Seoul for six decades, exercising south Korea's right to command wartime operation, a wanton violation of the AA, it noted, adding:
					
					To put an end to the state of war and establish a permanent peace mechanism on the peninsula is tasks to be carried out for the existence of the nation, and it is a historic task to be fulfilled by the nation to link the divided territory.
					
					To this end it is necessary to bring an end to the U.S. interference and domination over south Korea as well as the humiliating south Korea-U.S. ties.
					
					The article called for pooling efforts to conclude a peace treaty and achieve national reunification through the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Conclusion of Peace Treaty on Korean Peninsula Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Conclusion of Peace Treaty on Korean Peninsula Urged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The People's Action for Peace against War in south Korea sponsored a meeting calling for concluding a peace treaty on the Korean Peninsula. The meeting took place in Ryongsan, Seoul on July 27.
					Present there were personages from south Korean and foreign academic circles and civic and social bodies.
					
					Speakers at the meeting said that the June 25 Korean War was the most barbarous war in human history in which innocent people were massacred.
					
					They accused the south Korean army and police of killing civilians and concealing it.
					
					Saying the root cause of the escalation of the danger of war on the peninsula is none other than the U.S. troops present in south Korea, they called for withdrawing them from south Korea at an early date.
					
					They demanded the conclusion of a peace treaty and realization of peace on the peninsula.
					
					They called for expanding the on-going struggle and encouraging the world people to the struggle against the hegemonic policy of the U.S.
					
					The U.S. should come out to the negotiations for concluding a peace treaty on the Korean Peninsula, they stressed.
					
					They also called for rejecting all actions following the war moves of the U.S. and for realizing the solidarity of the peace-loving people to bring peace to Northeast Asia.
					
					Adopted there was an international peace declaration for ending the state of war on the Korean Peninsula and signing the peace treaty.
					
					At the end of the meeting its participants staged a demonstration.

articles.title: DPRK's War Victory Anniversary Observed Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's War Victory Anniversary Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Photo exhibitions, lectures and film shows took place in Russia, Democratic Congo and Ecuador in the period between July 18 and 26 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					On display in the venues of the events were photos showing the exploits of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					There were also works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing the successes of the Korean people in the drive to build a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					Participants in the film shows watched Korean film "Reply of Korea". 
					
					The chairman of the Moscow Veterans Committee of Russia said that Kim Il Sung was an iron-willed brilliant commander who protected the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation from the aggression by the U.S. imperialists and their allied forces. 
					
					He is the eternal leader of the Korean people who devoted all his life to the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people, the chairman added.
					
					The deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Democratic Congo said that the world progressive people remember the immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung for the war victory though 60 years have passed since the Korean people achieved the great victory in the war ignited by the U.S. imperialists. 
					
					The secretary general of the Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification said that Kim Il Sung was an invincible and iron-willed commander who defeated the U.S imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world by leading the army and people of the DPRK with his distinguished strategy, tactics and unique war methods. 
					
					The exploits for the war victory performed by him by protecting the independent dignity of the Korean people and making great contributions to accomplishing the human cause of independence will shine long in history, the secretary general added.

articles.title: DPRK's War Victory Anniversary Marked by Foreign Media
articles.content:
DPRK's War Victory Anniversary Marked by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Foreign magazine and newspapers carried special write-ups to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					The Chinese Hong Kong magazine International Link in its July issue carried several articles with photos showing feats of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					The Kuwaiti paper Al-Anbah on July 20 carried a special write-up with photos of the revolutionary activities of the Generalissimos and the Marshal under the headline "On the occasion of 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in Fatherland Liberation War against aggression by the imperialist allied forces". 
					
					The paper praised the exploits of the Generalissimos in the articles titled "Immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung for war victory" and "General Kim Jong Il and Songun politics which glorified Korea". 
					
					Another article titled "Leader Kim Jong Un and Korea today" praised the great personality of the Marshal. 
					
					The Zambian paper Post on July 7 carried an article titled "Smile of great man" with a photo of the Marshal. It said that the Korean people will always win shining victory and enjoy glory thanks to him. 
					
					The July issue of the British paper Line of March carried an article titled "Historic victory of Korean people" which stressed the world historic significance of the victory achieved by the army and people of the DPRK in the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Personages of Russia, Pakistan
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Personages of Russia, Pakistan
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- A meeting and film show took place in Russia and round-table talks in Pakistan in the period between July 20 and 24 to mark the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					Present at the events were personages of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, Academy of Sciences of Russia, Moscow Peace Fund, De Sandr Co. Ltd., Workers' Party of Pakistan, Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization, the Pakistan Trade Union Federation and the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association and other masses. 
					
					The chairman of the Russian association said that the world progressives regard the struggle of the Korean people who defeated the aggressors united close around President Kim Il Sung as an example of the efforts for defending sovereignty. 
					
					The general director of the Russian company said that the then young DPRK could win the victory in the war against the U.S. imperialists thanks to the wise commandership of Kim Il Sung. 
					
					The general secretary of the Punjab Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Pakistan, the secretary general of the Lahore Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association and other personages praised the undying exploits of Kim Il Sung who beat back the imperialist allied forces with his outstanding military idea, strategy and tactics and war methods and brought about the beginning of decline for the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world. 
					
					A message of greetings to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Russia.

articles.title: Swiss Organization Posts Kim Il Sung's Work on Its Website
articles.content:
Swiss Organization Posts Kim Il Sung's Work on Its Website
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Shatter Imperialist Moves towards Aggression and War and Safeguard Peace and Independence" was posted by the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on its website on July 19. 
					The work, published on July 3, Juche 72 (1983), clarifies the principle, ways and strategic and tactical issues arising in accomplishing the cause of global peace.

articles.title: British Organization Urges Conclusion of Peace Treaty between DPRK, U.S.
articles.content:
British Organization Urges Conclusion of Peace Treaty between DPRK, U.S.
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The British branch of the Korean Friendship Association released a statement on July 19 to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					The statement said:
					
					The U.S. imperialists ignited the Korean War on June 25, 1950 only to suffer a disgraceful defeat by the heroic Korean people who fought against them under the wise leadership of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, an invincible and iron-willed commander and legendary hero. 
					
					Since then the U.S. imperialists have taken the downhill path and the world movement for national liberation against imperialism greeted the period of a surge. 
					
					Korea, incomparably smaller than the U.S. in territory, could win a brilliant victory in the war against the U.S. imperialist aggressors thanks to the ingenious Juche-oriented war methods and leadership of Kim Il Sung. 
					
					The Korean War proved that even a small country can win when all the people turn out and bravely fight under the guidance of the great leader. 
					
					The British branch of the Korean Friendship Association extends the warmest congratulations to the dear respected Kim Jong Un and the Korean people on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the war.
					
					A peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S. has not been concluded though six decades have passed since the ceasefire. 
					
					The U.S. imperialists continuously stay in south Korea and desperately work hard to revive the "UN Command". 
					
					We strongly demand that the U.S. immediately withdraw its armed forces for aggression from south Korea, dismantle the "UN Command" and conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre cementerio de martires chinos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre cementerio de martires chinos
Pyongyang, 30 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito el dia 29 el cementerio de los martires del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino, situado en el distrito de Hoechang de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur, y deposito ahi una ofrenda floral con motivo del 60o aniversario del triunfo en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					Mientras se interpretaba la musica de la ocasion, fueron colocadas la ofrenda floral a nombre del Mariscal y la otra en nombre de la Comision Militar Central del PTC.
					
					Junto con los cuadros directivos acompanantes del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el Mariscal guardo un momento de silencio en memoria de los martires chinos caidos en la guerra coreana.
					
					A continuacion, fueron depositadas las ofrendas florales en nombre del Mariscal y de la Comision Militar Central del PTC ante la tumba de Mao Anying, hijo de Mao Zedong, gran lider del pueblo chino.
					
					El Mariscal guardo un momento de silencio en memoria de Mao Anying junto con los acompanantes.
					
					Luego recorrio la tumba de Mao Anying y las otras de martires chinos.
					
					Dijo que visito el cementerio porque en ocasion del 60o aniversario de la victoria en guerra, le vinieron a la mente los martires chinos quienes apoyaron derramando sangre la justa causa del pueblo coreano por defender la patria.
					
					Recordando los meritos de los voluntarios chinos, apunto que estan grabados en los montes y llanuras de la RPDC la sangre y el noble espiritu de ellos.
					
					Se conservara para siempre en el corazon del ejercito y pueblo coreanos el noble espiritu de sacrificio de los martires chinos que ofrendaron su valiosa vida en el frente coreano, destaco.
					
					Este cementerio es testigo de la historia y simbolo de la amistad Corea-China que demuestra la amistad combativa entre los pueblos de los dos paises que lucharon en conjunto por la causa comun.
					
					Al evocar el 26 de octubre de 2010 cuando visito ese lugar con el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, asevero que constituye la responsabilidad comun, noble obligacion moral y mision de los partidos y pueblos de Corea y China transmitir generacion tras generacion el espiritu revolucionario e imperecederos meritos de los martires chinos en acato al legado del Dirigente.
					
					Hay que conservar y cuidar bien este cementerio en el distrito Hoechang, remodelar las tumbas de los martires del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino a lo largo del pais e intensificar la educacion con ellas, indico y tomo las medidas de trabajo correspondientes.
					
					No debemos olvidar nunca el desinteresado apoyo internacionalista, que dieron el partido, gobierno y pueblo de China cuando nuestro pueblo atravesaba pruebas, y la sangre vertida por los valientes combatientes del cuerpo chino y continuar con firmeza el testigo de la amistad Corea-China, puntualizo.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Kyok Sik, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Won Hong, Kim Yang Gon, Choe Pu Il, Ri Yong Gil, Kim Kyong Ok, Kim Yong Chol, Pak Jong Chon, Pak Thae Song, Hwang Pyong So, Kim Pyong Ho y Kim Kye Gwan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia con delegados de veteranos de guerra
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia con delegados de veteranos de guerra
Pyongyang, 30 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tomo fotos de recuerdo junto con los delegados de veteranos de guerra participantes en las festividades del 60o aniversario del triunfo en la gran Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria. 
					Le acompanaron Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Jang Jong Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Ri Yong Mu, O Kuk Ryol, Kim Won Hong, Choe Pu Il, Ri Pyong Sam, Ju Kyu Chang y los ex combatientes antijaponeses Ri Ul Sol, Hwang Sun Hui y Kim Chol Man.
					
					Cuando hizo su aparicion el Mariscal a la sede de filmacion, los participantes le acogieron con aclamaciones "!Viva!" expresando maximo honor y agradecimiento a el quien lleva adelante generacion tras generacion las imperecederas proezas de los grandes Generalisimos por la victoria en la guerra y en la revolucion del Songun. 
					
					El Mariscal respondio con la mano levantada a las aclamaciones de los participantes.
					
					Y felicito calurosamente a los veteranos de guerra que hicieron gran aporte a lograr la gran victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria y se fotografio junto a ellos. 
					
					El Mariscal expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los veteranos de guerra con buena salud entreguen a las generaciones venideras el espiritu de la decada de 1950 para estimularles a continuar con firmeza la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Songhung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Songhung
Pyongyang, 30 de julio (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 60o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito la vispera el lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Songhung donde estuvo asentada la comandancia del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino.
					Recorriendo varios puntos del lugar inclusive la casa semi-subterranea, el tunel subterraneo, el dormitorio y la casa de los militares, el averiguo en detalles el estado de exhibicion y conservacion de los datos y objetos de interes historico.
					
					En la casa semi-subterranea, vio una foto del Presidente Kim Il Sung retratada con Peng Dehuai, comandante del citado cuerpo, y recordo con gran emocion aquellos dias inolvidables en que combatieron juntos los uniformados y habitantes de los dos paises.
					
					En la sala operacional del tunel, donde estan colocadas una foto del Presidente dejando autografo el 4 de marzo de 1953 para evaluar altamente los meritos de los oficiales y soldados del cuerpo chino y la otra del mismo manuscrito, Kim Jong Un dijo que bajo la bandera de "resistir a los yanquis, ayudar a Corea, y defender el hogar y el pais propios", el partido y gobierno de China enviaron el cuerpo de voluntarios al frente coreano y ayudaron con sangre nuestra justa causa cuando nuestro pueblo libraba combates dificiles contra las fuerzas agresoras imperialistas.
					
					Al ver el mapa operacional colgado en el tunel, recordo que numerosos combatientes chinos conocidos y desconocidos, inclusive el heroe Huang Jieguang surgido en el combate del monte Sanggam, dedicaron sin vacilacion alguna su juventud y vida en el frente coreano. 
					
					Pasando revista al dormitorio usado por el Presidente el 26 de agosto de 1953 y en otras ocasiones y visitado el 25 de agosto de 1954 por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el Mariscal senalo que es una valiosa reliquia que conserva las huellas de guerra.
					
					Acto seguido, estuvo en el monumento a la actividad historico-revolucionaria construida para transmitir eternamente las inmortales hazanas del Presidente.
					
					En la casa de los militares donde el Presidente pronuncio el 27 de agosto de 1953 un discurso historico, el Mariscal puntualizo que los uniformados y habitantes coreanos y chinos vinieron consolidando la amistad combativa compartiendo la sangre en la lucha por cumplir la causa comun.
					
					Finalizado el recorrido por el lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Songhung, dio valiosas instrucciones sobre el mantenimiento y la operacion del mismo.
					
					Al final, tomo una foto de recuerdo junto con los empleados del lugar.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Kyok Sik, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Won Hong, Kim Yang Gon, Choe Pu Il, Ri Yong Gil, Kim Kyong Ok, Kim Yong Chol, Pak Jong Chon, Pak Thae Song, Hwang Pyong So, Kim Pyong Ho y Kim Kye Gwan.

articles.title: Jang Jong Nam se reune con delegacion de veteranos rusos
articles.content:
Jang Jong Nam se reune con delegacion de veteranos rusos
Pyongyang, 30 de julio (ACNC) -- El ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, Jang Jong Nam departio el dia 30 con la delegacion de veteranos de guerra coreana de Rusia presidida por Ya. V. Kanov, vicepresidente del consejo ruso de veteranos de guerra coreana.

articles.title: Tiene lugar funcion de delegacion cultural y artistica de China
articles.content:
Tiene lugar funcion de delegacion cultural y artistica de China
Pyongyang, 30 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 28 y 30 en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este la funcion de la delegacion cultural y artistica del Ejercito Popular de Liberacion de China (EPLCh) que toma parte en festividades por el 60o aniversario del triunfo en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					La vieron Kim Kyok Sik, Kang Sok Ju, Mun Kyong Dok, Hong Son Ok, secretaria del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los creadores y artistas del sector artistico de las fuerzas armadas y la sociedad, profesores y  estudiantes de la rama de educacion artistica y los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					La presenciaron tambien el embajador Liu Hongcai y los miembros de la embajada china en Corea, los huespedes y estudiantes chinos en aqui.
					
					Los ejecutantes conmovieron a la audiencia al cantar con gran sensacion el coro masculino "Cancion del General Kim Il Sung" y "Cancion del General Kim Jong Il", inmortales himnos revolucionarios.
					
					En la escena se pusieron el solo femenino "himno a los heroes", el solo masculino "Bandera roja flameando", el circo "Fuerza y belleza" y otras diversas piezas que describen la lucha heroica y el aspecto romantico del ejercito y pueblo chinos.
					
					El solo masculino "Cancion del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino" represento vividamente las proezas de los combatientes del CVPCh quienes tomaron parte del frente coreano y lucharon valientemente bajo la bandera de resistir a los yanquis, ayudar a Corea, y defender el hogar y el pais propios.
					
					El solista canto con fervor la cancion coreana "Canta, bifurcacion a Mangyongdae" para encomiar las imperecederas hazanas revolucionarias del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien se abnego por la prosperidad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					La funcion, que reflejo bien el contenido ideo-tematico de las piezas con voces fuertes,  movimiento hermoso y acoplamiento bien organizado, gano la efusiva ovacion de los espectadores.
